About me


Heya! I am Aaditya Thakkar. I am a 3rd year B.Tech(ICT) undergrad student at Dhirubhai Ambani Institute of Information and Communication Technology, India. I like web development and competitive coding. I also like contributing to open-source projects. I also have my projects up on my github page. I am also working as a full stack intern at Appbase.io.
